Preparing your data
============

Observations
------------

To use RASCAL, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install rascal-ties
   
Reanalysis
------------

To use RASCAL, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ git clone https://github.com/alvaro-gc95/RASCAL
